content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line at (1,1) and (3,1)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace at (1,1) with burner inserter at (1.5,2.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5,3.5) storing 56 iron plates
- Stone furnace at (3,1) with burner inserter at (3.5,2.5) 
- Wooden chest at (3.5,3.5) storing 50 iron plates
- Empty wooden chest at (5.5,3.5) with burner inserter at (5.5,2.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line at (2,7) and (4,7)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace at (2,7) with burner inserter at (2.5,8.5)
- Wooden chest at (2.5,9.5) storing 53 copper plates
- Stone furnace at (4,7) with burner inserter at (4.5,8.5)
- Wooden chest at (4.5,9.5) storing 84 copper plates

### Power Generation System
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5) pumping water
- Boiler at (7,35.5) connected to water supply
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Two pipe groups connecting the components:
  - Water pipes at (5.5,33.5) area connecting pump to boiler
  - Steam pipes at (8.5,35.5) area connecting boiler to engine
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles connecting production facilities

### Disconnected Structures
- Offshore pump at (-5.5,26.5) not connected to any system

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to place entities without having them in inventory
- Check if required entity is in inventory before attempting to place it
- Craft missing entities before trying to place them

### Errors when trying to craft without sufficient materials
- Ensure all required ingredients are available in sufficient quantities before attempting crafting

### Power system issues
- Boiler has no fuel which prevents power generation
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning indicating steam flow issues
- Ensure proper fuel supply and fluid connections between components

Note: Since steps 40-41 only involved crafting activities and no new structures were built or modified, the EXISTING STRUCTURES section remains unchanged. The previous error about lab crafting materials has been resolved as the agent successfully crafted the required iron gear wheels and the lab.
